text: John Hugh "Buddy" Dyer (born August 7, 1958) is an American Democratic politician who became Mayor of Orlando, Florida since 2003. Before, he was a representative for Orlando in the Florida State Senate from 1992 to 2002. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:American mayors Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from Orlando, Florida
title: Buddy Dyer
